page.title: 07Cramlington:Shopping Centre
page.content: The town's shopping centre is a private development owned by Cramlington Investments Ltd. The centre is a covered area, which makes shopping pleasant in all weathers. It is very modern, with different levels joined by slopes and steps to provide easy access for all. Large airy walkways with trees, plants and shrubs make the centre attractive. There is a wide range of shops to meet all requirements. The main food stores, which have the largest floor space, are Co-op and Presto. The other shops are smaller and include Banks, Chemists, Greengrocers, Hardware, Travel Agents, Building Societies, Clothes and Shoes, Butchers, Estate Agents,Hairdressers, Opticians, Jewellers, Bakers, Furniture and Cafes,which benefit from the adequate parking facilities. St.Peter's M.S.
